text:
### SCENE 24 – Kid Interrogation  

_Radio plays “Paris”; Hero slams it off, starts working. A kid bursts in._

**Kid:** Evaru nuvvu?  
**Hero:** Mee akka friend ni.  
**Kid:** Naku telsu—nuvvu *boyfriend* vi kadha. Neeku interrogation undhi, padha…  
_They enter a room._

**Hero:** Muddostunnav ra…  
**Kid:** Nuvvu emi Arjun Reddy kadhu nannu muddhu pettadaniki! Cheppu—nee purthi peru, em chestuntav, ekkada untav, ma akka ni enduku padesav!  
**Hero:** Rey, aapu! Inkoka mata matladina **porn chustunnav** ani mee nanna-ki chepta.  
**Kid:** _Ammo—oddhu!_  
**Hero:** Em ardam aindhi veediki… _(exits)_  

**Heroine:** Entha sepu aindhi vacchi?  
**Hero:** Ippude; gani vacchi *raagane* land-mine meedha adagesa…  
**Heroine:** Haha—padha veldam.  
<!-- end Scene 24 -->

---
